nodes.text: Kydra was a Jedi Knight who fought for the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars. In 22 BBY, Kydra served the Republic during the Battle of Falleen. Confederate forces completely destroyed the Republic task force, killing Kydra and seven other Jedi in the process.
Kydra was first mentioned in Star Wars canon in the novel The Clone Wars: Wild Space. Wild Space was published in 2008 and written by Karen Miller.
